name: Al-Qadim: The Genie's Curse

write_file.content:
[sdl]
sensitivity=30
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1" -t cdrom
D:
install.exe
exit

[sdl]
sensitivity=30
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1" -t cdrom
C:
cd genie
genie
exit

content:
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/Al-Qadim.conf
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      cp -avr "$src/."  "$dst"'
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy-alt.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/bulkcopy-alt.sh
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/HDD $GAMEDIR/CDD $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1
    file: mkdir
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc
    requires: install.exe
- execute:
    args: $DISC "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1"
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy-alt.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1"
    file: /bin/chmod
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=30

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1" -t cdrom

      D:

      install.exe

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/Al-Qadim_setup.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/Al-Qadim_setup.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR/HDD/
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=30

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1" -t cdrom

      C:

      cd genie

      genie

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/Al-Qadim.conf
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
